marketplaces.repo_description: Your AI's shortcut to mass-produce alpha-generating quant strategies.

files.README.md:
# FinLab AI **Let AI discover your next alpha.**
## Installation ```bash curl -sSf https://ai.finlab.finance/install.sh | sh ``` Auto-detects your CLI (Claude Code / Codex / Gemini), installs [uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/) if needed, and sets up the skill. ## Documentation | Document | Content | |----------|---------| | Data Reference | 900+ columns across 80+ tables | | Backtesting Reference | sim() API, resampling, metrics | | Factor Examples | 60+ complete strategy examples | | Best Practices | Patterns, anti-patterns, tips | | ML Reference | Feature engineering, labels |
